title: Blended Education Program for Strengthening Leadership and Clinical Pharmacy Practice Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic pharmaceutical knowledge and foundational experience as a manager
context.additional_context: Leadership competency development program at corporate educational institutions, featuring a blended learning environment combining online learning and field practice using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and analyze three or more improvement points in patient treatment processes in clinical settings and write analytical reports.
Learners can design and execute team-based medication management process improvement projects by applying leadership theories.
Learners can systematically manage and report project progress using digital tools (online collaboration platforms).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
